Understate: The claim understates the fact that President Trump did sign legislation in October 2018 to clean up trash from oceans and lakes.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it states that the mainstream news media did not report on the legislation, but the expert's verdict provides evidence that national news organizations did report on it.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the mainstream news media did not report on the legislation, without providing evidence to support this assumption.
